name: White Quinoa
description:
Ingredients: White quinoa (USDA certified organic)

Our white quinoa is sourced from the Andes and is USDA certified organic.

White quinoa is the most commonly known quinoa which is a complete protein offering the essential amino acids in the right proportions to support an individual's nutritional needs. 

Features: 

Gluten Free 

Prewashed

Prep time: 12 - 15 minutes 

100% compostable packaging

Free shipping in NYC only. Read the FAQ on instructions. 

#intiquinoa

name: Red Quinoa
description:
Ingredients: Red quinoa (USDA certified organic)

Our USDA certified organic Red Quinoa is a complete protein offering all the essential amino acids necessary for your overall health. Compared to our White Quinoa, the red variety has a slightly earthier and nuttier flavor with a richer color all while maintaining it's distinct shape. 

Features:

Gluten Free

Prewashed

Prep time: 12 - 15 minutes

100% compostable packaging

Free shipping in NYC only. Read the FAQ on instructions. 

#intiquinoa

name: Black Quinoa
description:
Ingredients: Black quinoa (USDA certified organic)

Our USDA certified organic Black Quinoa is a complete protein offering all the essential amino acids necessary for your overall health. Compared to our White Quinoa, the black variety has an earthier, nuttier, and sweeter flavor profile with a captivating black color, all while maintaing a stronger, crunchier texture. 

Features: 
 
Gluten Free 

Prewashed

Prep time: 12 - 15 minutes

100% compostable packaging
